content.name: 1d9L

content.class: bg-slate-100 rounded p-3 my-2 max-w-3xl mx-auto
text-lg m-5 p-5 bg-yellow-200 rounded-xl shadow-lg

content.text:
Active voice:
Alexander Graham Bell invented the phone.

Passive voice:
Affirmative:
The phone ______invented by Alexander Graham Bell.

Negative:
The phone _________ invented by Alexander Graham Bell.

Interrogative:
________ the phone invented by Alexander Graham bell?

Now, let’s do the same, in present…

Active voice:
We use social media to communicate with people.

Passive voice:
Affirmative:
Social media_____ used to communicate with people.

Negative:
Social media ______ used to communicate with people.

Interrogative form:
______social media used to communicate with people?

If you noticed, the only thing that changed it’s form was the auxiliary verb, the rest of the structure remained the same.
